NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​Interfaces.​IReleaseNotesUpdater
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​Interfaces.​IReleaseNotesUpdater
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​UpdateAvailableWindow

Interface for objects that have the ability to show release notes to the user.  Used by the UpdateAvailableWindow and its view model to coordinate when the release notes should be shown.

Functions
ShowReleaseNotes
void ShowReleaseNotes(
string notes
)

Show the given release notes to the user

Parameter
notes
string

string of HTML release notes to show to the end-user
